Module se1.bestellsystem
Package system

Interface InventoryManager

All Superinterfaces:
DataRepository.ArticleRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
InventoryManagerImpl
public interface InventoryManager extends DataRepository.ArticleRepository
Public interface of the InventoryManager that manages the inventory of articles. InventoryManager uses (and hides) the Article repository.

  • Method Details

    • getUnitsInStock

      int getUnitsInStock(String id)
      Return units in stock for given article.
      Parameters:
      id - article identifier.
      Returns:
      units in stock of article.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if id is null or id does not exist.

    • update

      void update(String id, int updatedUnitsInStock)
      Update inventory for article.
      Parameters:
      id - article identifier.
      updatedUnitsInStock - update with number (must be >= 0).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if id is null, id does not exist or unitsInStock is < 0).

    • isFillable

      boolean isFillable(Order order)
      Test that order is fillable. An order is fillable when all order items meet the condition: orderItem.unitsOrdered <= inventory(article).unitsInStock.
      Parameters:
      order - to validate.
      Returns:
      true if order is fillable from current inventory.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if order is null.

    • fill

      boolean fill(Order order)
      Fills order by deducting all order items from the inventory, if the order is fillable. If the order is not fillable, inventory remains unchanged (transactional behavior: all or none order item is filled).
      Parameters:
      order - to fill.
      Returns:
      true if order has been filled, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if order is null.

    • printInventory

      StringBuffer printInventory()
      Print inventory as table.
      Returns:
      printed inventory (as table).

    • printInventory

      StringBuffer printInventory(int sortedBy, boolean descending, Integer limit)
      Print inventory as table with sorting and limiting criteria.
      Parameters:
      sortedBy - sorting criteria 1: byPrice; 2: byValue; 3: byUnits; 4: byDescription; 5: bySKU; else: unsorted
      descending - true if in descending order
      limit - upper boundary of articles printed after sorting
      Returns:
      printed inventory (as table).
